author: myu-unix
name: Ombre
description:
Ombre is a theme based on Minty 2.2 (Kudos !) with a subtle darkgray translucent panel that might remind another unix-based OS :) .

Tested with Cinnamon 2.2.16, 2.4.3, 2.6.13 and 2.8.2

Feel free to report any bugs or request for improvements :)

 

Changelog

Version 1.0 : 20 October 2014 : Initial release
